CustomField.description: If checked, the Timesheet Approver will not be emailed to advise on a timesheets submission if there a 0 hours AND no related expenses
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the Timesheet Approver will not be emailed to advise on a timesheets submission if there a 0 hours AND no related expenses
CustomField.label: No Approver Emails On 0 Timesheets
